main

Class StockMasterGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • main.StockMasterGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class StockMasterGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    The GUI/front end of our app with which the user can interact. The GUI is integrated with the back ends to take user inputs, perform the corresponding tasks and display the results(emoji + stock chart).
    Author:
    Zhenghua (Calvin) Chen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
